distros.name: Arch Linux
distros.desc: Arch is a very powerful and customizable distro mainly used by linux enthusiasts or on servers.

distros.name: Antergos
distros.desc: Antergos is a varient of Arch Linux that is designed to be easy to set up and use.

distros.name: Manjaro
distros.desc: Manjaro is a user-friendly Linux distribution based on Arch Linux.

distros.name: Ubuntu
distros.desc: Ubuntu is a very popular and easy to use distro with many 'flavours' available for easy customization. It's great for beginners.

distros.name: KDE Neon
distros.desc: Neon is an easy to use distro based around the KDE Plasma desktop and other KDE tools.

distros.name: Debian
distros.desc: Debian is great for almost anything and can be customized in many ways. It can also run on chromebooks.

distros.name: Ubuntu Budgie
distros.desc: Ubuntu Budgie is a flavour of Ubuntu with the Budgie desktop and tools pre-installed.

distros.name: Kubuntu
distros.desc: Kubuntu is a flavour of Ubuntu with the KDE plasma desktop pre-installed.

distros.name: Solus
distros.desc: Solus is an operating system that is designed for home computing.

distros.name: Zorin OS
distros.desc: Zorin OS is an alternative to Windows and macOS, designed to make your computer faster, more powerful and more secure.

distros.name: Raspbian
distros.desc: Raspberry Pi Desktop comes pre-installed with plenty of software for education, programming and general use, including Python, Scratch, Sonic Pi, Java, and more.

distros.name: OpenSUSE
distros.desc: "The makers' choice for sysadmins, developers and desktop users."

distros.name: Fedora
distros.desc: Fedora is a polished, easy to use operating system for both laptop and desktop computers.

distros.name: Linux Lite
distros.desc: Linux Lite is a very easy to use distro based upon the latest LTS release of Ubuntu.

distros.name: Linux Mint
distros.desc: Linux Mint is fresh, clean and has a user friendly environment to get you started fast and simple.

distros.name: elementary OS
distros.desc: elementary OS is a fast and open replacement for Windows and macOS. Designers love this.

distros.name: deepin
distros.desc: deepin is a Linux distribution devoted to providing beautiful, easy to use, safe and reliable system for global users.

distros.name: Lubuntu

distros.name: Xubuntu

distros.name: Peppermint OS
distros.desc: A lightning fast, lightweight Linux based Os. Secure, stable and fully customizable.

distros.name: Red Hat
distros.desc: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) is a Linux distribution developed by Red Hat and targeted toward the commercial market.
